column4: I have tried setting a laptop in 12.04 and make it look like before but I just cant
I was used to gnome also but I just jump in and did a fresh install of 12.04 and using unity 2d
to it is fine and don't really care about all the different customization you can do to desktops
Just one suggestion - do a fresh install of 12.04 - I upgraded from 11.10 and it hosed up my whole system
